name: Fruity Friends (Glatus)
description:
Fruity Friends was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.

Hud is only visible in Fullscreen mode.

Fruity Friends is about a Pineapple that wants to find out of the basement.
Pineapple then meets a Melon and fights together with it to get out.
There are 9 coins hidden in this game and a little easter egg from my first game "Spirun".

Health and Coins:
The red number in the top left corner is your health.
The yellow number in the top right corner is the amount of coins you've collected.

Controlls:
walk: Arrow keys or WASD.
shoot: Once unlocked, point with mouse and leftclick.
